34#ifndef OPENPAM_STRLCPY_H_INCLUDED
35#define OPENPAM_STRLCPY_H_INCLUDED
36
37#ifndef HAVE_STRLCPY
38size_t openpam_strlcpy(char *, const char *, size_t);
39#undef strlcpy
40#define strlcpy(arg, ...) openpam_strlcpy(arg, __VA_ARGS__)
41#endif
42
43#endif
